entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING ENDED, Dome Creek
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 09:35 AM PST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Snow at times heavy. High zero.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind south 20 km/h. High zero. Wind chill minus 10 this morning. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of snow. Temperature steady near zero.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind south 20 km/h. Temperature steady near zero. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near plus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind south 20 km/h. Temperature steady near plus 1. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low plus 1. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 4.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 4. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers. Low plus 2. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Low minus 3. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Thursday 02 February 2023
